name: 百詰怪軼與金魚
storyline:
In the blink of an eye, he was in a mysterious and deserted street, and ominous whispers kept coming from the ears of the amnesiac boy.

Waking up in a strange, uninhabited street, the protagonist Qinghe fell into the opposite side of the town, "Inside Street" for unknown reasons.
Follow the floating goldfish and explore the depths of the quiet world all the way; all kinds of weather phenomena, natural rules, trivial matters, and any intangible things are transformed into tangible gods or residents here.
Get acquainted with a wolf who also has amnesia and claims to be a loyal dog, a
mysterious but handsome poisonous spider,
and a friendly jackal lurking in the dark.
The inner street hides a beautiful scene that has been forgotten by people, but it also attracts people to never return.
Even──falling
into the trap of death.
Guided by whispers in his ears, the young man embarks on a journey to find an "answer".

──At the junction of reality and unreality, a story of forgotten people intertwined.
summary: 唯美奇幻的多結局視覺小說。現實與非現實模糊地交替────被遺留或被遺忘的人們的故事。搶先體驗序章故事
